title: Cuckoo/Cucu: A Mexican Folktale/Un cuento folklorico mexicano
description: Cuckoo is beautiful. Trouble is, she's lazy. She never does her share of workâ€”that is, until a field fire threatens the season's seed crop and Cuckoo is the only one who can save it. But will she risk harming her lovely feathers by flying through the thick smoke and flames?
author: Lois Ehlert
